apps.name: AnisFlix
apps.localizedDescription: AnisFlix est votre compagnon de streaming ultime. Regardez vos films, séries et chaînes TV préférés en haute qualité.

versions.localizedDescription: fix(ios): remove redundant manual FSVid extraction in Views (caused regression) - Reverted MovieDetailView and SeriesDetailView back to original direct playback logic (FSVidService already provides M3U8). - Reverted forced local proxy in CustomVideoPlayer. - Kept FSVidService filter fix (main fix for series).
